ygData.subject: Re: Twinking thoughts, continued
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow i think I mentioned i was fully decked out and all of a sudden 50k messages(heh) come out about twinking ethics.  Its stupid who cares about twinks.
ygData.messageBody:
Wow i think I mentioned i was fully decked out and all of a sudden 50k
messages(heh) come out about twinking ethics. Its stupid who cares about
twinks. Hopefully we can stop this crap and talk about cool stuff about
monks.

Bismatal the twinker 23rd rank

hahahh
----- Original Message -----
From: Jeffrey Sue <jsue@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 8:14 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Twinking thoughts, continued


> From: Jeffrey Sue <jsue@...>
>
> At 08:08 AM 9/15/1999 -0700, you wrote:
> >From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> >
> >I think another idea about the level limits could be the con system, if
you
> >con certain level and you do not get experience from them, the same
should
> >work in reverse for items, level groups should work for instance 1-5 5-15
> >15-25 25-35 35-50 or something of the like. That would solve a lot of
those
> >problems, but in my real opinion, I just really love this game, it may be
> >because I am still so new, haven't even got past my first month and my
19th
> >(almost 20th Level) Monk is my pride and joy. I really enjoy when people
> >look at my gear and say nice spread, I worked damn hard for my stuff and
it
> >is my own personnel satisfaction I get from my character. If I see
someone
> >else who is twinked, I think that's good for them, I hope they enjoy that
> >because I know they will enjoyment of the game for they have nothing to
look
> >forward too, so those people won't be around too much longer.
>
> Why do they have nothing to look forward to? Maybe they are second
characters
> trying to get to where his friends are so they can group together. Maybe
> they are
> trying to get to places they haven't seen yet because they would die
almost
> instantly. Some people don't play the game strictly to get cool items.
>
> >
> >
> >Kaladiel
> >19th Season
> >Brell Serilius
>
>
